lines.gurmukhi: jYsy mwqw ipqw Anyk aupjwq suq pUMjI dY dY bnj ibauhwrih lgwvhI
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Maataa Pitaa Anayk Oupajaat Souta , Poonjee Dai Dai Banaj Biuhaarahi Lagaavahee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as parents give birth and raise many children and then support them with money and material to put them into trading business;

lines.gurmukhi: ikrq ibrq kir koaU mUil KovY rovY koaU lwB lBiq kY cauguno bFwvhI
lines.transliteration_english: Kirat Birat Kari Kooo Mooli Khovai Rovai , Kooo Laabh Labhati Kai Chaougouno Baddhaavahee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: And out of them, one may lose all that he has invested in business and cry while other may earn much profit to enhance his investment fourfold;

lines.gurmukhi: jYso jYso joeI kulw Drm hY krm krY qYso qYso jsu Apjsu pRgtwvhI
lines.transliteration_english: Jaiso Jaiso Joee Kulaa Dharam Hai Karam Karai , Taiso Taiso Jasu Apajasu Pragataavahee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Every member of the family works and conducts himself according to the family traditions, and every son earns good or bad name according to the deeds performed by them.

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy siqgur smdrsI puhup gq isK swKw ibibiD ibrK Pl pwvhI ]370]
lines.transliteration_english: Taisay Satigur Samadarasee Puhoup Gata , Sikh Saakhaa Bibidhi Birakh Dhal Paavahee ?370?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly, the True Guru is like a flower that offers fragrance to all in equal measures but because of their higher or lower consciousness, the Sikhs obtain many types of blessings from him. Those who abide by His sermon, benefit while others who may get
